attributes.action: David Cameron to step down as PM and an early general election to take place
attributes.additional_details:
David Cameron and his administration have brought misery to thousands of households with decisions that effect with the way the UK people live.  Families face eviction and poverty with little to no action being taken from our government.  His embarrassing actions in the EU Parliament has also damaged the way the UK is viewed by the rest of the European community and the rest of the world with our economic position being weakened considerably.  He has not listened to what the people so desperately want and no public consultations have been sort after with regards to our position within the EU.

Action to be taken:-  David Cameron forced to resign and call for an early general election
